title: cold crush! please help, whats this??? ...and another thing....
content:
can anyone please tell me what the ’cold crush’ typeface is?????

thanks!!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081201175509im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/coldcrush_6270.jpg)

 [‹ Incredibly delicious](http://web.archive.org/web/20081201175509/http:/www.typophile.com/node/48829 "Go to previous forum topic") [hi i need help identifying this stencil font ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081201175509/http:/www.typophile.com/node/48820 "Go to next forum topic")
author: neill k

comments.content: That’s Shinola, a Letraset font. Don’t know if it has been digitalized.
